name: Tank Royale
description: Survive in tank battle! Or join with your friend to fight others! Battle, collect and customize your own tank!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 64-bit Processor: Intel Core i5 2.6 GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Intel Iris Graphics 540 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 64-bit Processor: Intel Core i7 3.6 GHz Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 750 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1 GB available space
